name: Geode In Pause Menu
description: Manage your mods outside the main menu.

game-pause-menu.name: Game Pause Menu
game-pause-menu.description: Enables the Geode button in the game pause menu.

editor-pause-menu.description: Enables the Geode button in the editor pause menu.

level-edit-menu.description: Enables the Geode button in the level edit menu.

level-info-menu.name: Level Info Menu
level-info-menu.description: Enables the Geode button in the level info menu.
